root.name: Bomberman Ultra
root.description: This is essentially the same downloadable game as Bomberman Live, found on the Xbox 360. The downloadable content featured for Bomberman Live comes free with this version which includes the Destructoid mascot costume.Multiplayer OptionsOne of the main advantages over Bomberman Live is the ability to play with up to 7 players on one console since the Playstation 3 supports up to seven control devices. 8 players can play online with up to four players per console.
